00314 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_BaseSpectrum {
00315 
00316 public:
00317 
00323     EGS_BaseSpectrum() : count(0), sum_E(0), sum_E2(0),
00324         type("Unknown spectrum") {};
00325 
00327     virtual ~EGS_BaseSpectrum() {};
00328 
00335     const string &getType() const {
00336         return type;
00337     };
00338 
00345     inline EGS_Float sampleEnergy(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00346         EGS_Float e = sample(rndm);
00347         count++;
00348         sum_E += e;
00349         sum_E2 += e*e;
00350         return e;
00351     };
00352 
00358     virtual EGS_Float maxEnergy() const = 0;
00359 
00365     virtual EGS_Float expectedAverage() const = 0;
00366 
00379     virtual bool storeState(ostream &data_out) const {
00380         if (!egsStoreI64(data_out,count)) {
00381             return false;
00382         }
00383         data_out << " " << sum_E << " " << sum_E2 << endl;
00384         if (!data_out.good() || data_out.fail()) {
00385             return false;
00386         }
00387         return true;
00388     };
00389 
00403     virtual bool setState(istream &data_in) {
00404         if (!egsGetI64(data_in,count)) {
00405             return false;
00406         }
00407         data_in >> sum_E >> sum_E2;
00408         if (data_in.eof() || !data_in.good() || data_in.fail()) {
00409             return false;
00410         }
00411         return true;
00412     };
00413 
00426     virtual bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00427         EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00428         double sum_E_save = sum_E, sum_E2_save = sum_E2;
00429         if (!setState(data_in)) {
00430             return false;
00431         }
00432         count += count_save;
00433         sum_E += sum_E_save;
00434         sum_E2 += sum_E2_save;
00435         return true;
00436     };
00437 
00449     virtual void resetCounter() {
00450         count = 0;
00451         sum_E = 0;
00452         sum_E2 = 0;
00453     };
00454 
00468     static EGS_BaseSpectrum *createSpectrum(EGS_Input *inp);
00469 
00475     void getSampledAverage(EGS_Float &e, EGS_Float &de) const {
00476         if (count > 1) {
00477             e = sum_E/count;
00478             de = sum_E2/count;
00479             de -= e*e;
00480             if (de > 0) {
00481                 de = sqrt(de/(count-1));
00482             }
00483         }
00484     };
00485 
00491     void reportAverageEnergy() const;
00492 
00493 protected:
00494 
00501     virtual EGS_Float sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) = 0;
00502 
00504     EGS_I64 count;
00505 
00507     double  sum_E;
00508 
00510     double  sum_E2;
00511 
00515     string  type;
00516 
00517 };
00518 
00537 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_BaseSimpleSource : public EGS_BaseSource {
00538 
00539 public:
00540 
00548     EGS_BaseSimpleSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec,
00549                          const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00550         EGS_BaseSource(Name,f), q(Q), s(Spec), count(0) { };
00551 
00562     EGS_BaseSimpleSource(EGS_Input *input, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00563 
00568     ~EGS_BaseSimpleSource() {
00569         if (s) {
00570             delete s;
00571         }
00572     };
00573 
00584     virtual bool isValid() const {
00585         return (s != 0);
00586     };
00587 
00599     virtual EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00600                                     int &Q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00601                                     EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00602         Q = q;
00603         E = s->sampleEnergy(rndm);
00604         getPositionDirection(rndm,x,u,wt);
00605         setLatch(latch);
00606         return ++count;
00607     };
00608 
00617     virtual void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00618                                       EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) = 0;
00619 
00625     virtual EGS_Float getEmax() const {
00626         return s->maxEnergy();
00627     };
00628 
00639     virtual bool storeFluenceState(ostream &data_out) const {
00640         return true;
00641     };
00642 
00648     virtual bool storeState(ostream &data_out) const {
00649         if (!egsStoreI64(data_out,count)) {
00650             return false;
00651         }
00652         if (!s->storeState(data_out)) {
00653             return false;
00654         }
00655         if (!storeFluenceState(data_out)) {
00656             return false;
00657         }
00658         return true;
00659     };
00660 
00667     virtual bool addState(istream &data) {
00668         EGS_I64 count_save = count;
00669         if (!egsGetI64(data,count)) {
00670             return false;
00671         }
00672         if (!s->addState(data)) {
00673             return false;
00674         }
00675         if (!addFluenceData(data)) {
00676             return false;
00677         }
00678         count += count_save;
00679         return true;
00680     };
00681 
00688     virtual void resetCounter() {
00689         count = 0;
00690         s->resetCounter();
00691         resetFluenceCounter();
00692     };
00693 
00703     virtual bool addFluenceData(istream &data) {
00704         return true;
00705     }
00706 
00717     virtual void resetFluenceCounter() { };
00718 
00729     virtual bool setFluenceState(istream &data) {
00730         return true;
00731     };
00732 
00739     virtual bool setState(istream &data) {
00740         if (!egsGetI64(data,count)) {
00741             return false;
00742         }
00743         if (!s->setState(data)) {
00744             return false;
00745         }
00746         if (!setFluenceState(data)) {
00747             return false;
00748         }
00749         return true;
00750     };
00751 
00752 protected:
00753 
00760     virtual void setLatch(int &latch) {
00761         latch = 0;
00762     };
00763 
00765     int              q;
00766 
00768     EGS_BaseSpectrum *s;
00769 
00771     string           type;
00772 
00774     EGS_I64          count;
00775 
00776 };
00777 
00787 template <class T>
00788 EGS_BaseSource *createSourceTemplate(EGS_Input *input,
00789                                      EGS_ObjectFactory *f, const char *name) {
00790     EGS_BaseSource::addKnownTypeId(typeid(T).name());
00791     if (!input) {
00792         egsWarning("createSource(%s): null input?\n",name);
00793         return 0;
00794     }
00795     T *res = new T(input,f);
00796     if (!res->isValid())  {
00797         egsWarning("createSource(%s): the input is not "
00798                    "sufficient to create a valid source\n",name);
00799         delete res;
00800         return 0;
00801     }
00802     return res;
00803 };
